DOC.brief_summary: Primary Aim A . To determine listening prerecord guide imagery 3 time per week 4 week reduce state anxiety , perceive stress , burnout , compassion fatigue , vicarious trauma Fronltine Service staff . Primary Aim B . To determine staff continue listen guide imagery first 4 week study .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Guided Imagery Nonprofit 's Employees
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare change stress level employee listen prerecord guided imagery employee take break , determine employee likely adopt prerecord guided imagery self-care tool . Participants randomly assign either guide imagery group control group . Members control group ask take 10 minute break 3 time per week 4 week . Members guide imagery group ask listen one prerecord guide imagery track 3 time per week 4 week . All participant fill questionnaire 4 week period . All participant fill short form listen guided imagery , take break . Phase 2 : After phase 1 complete , participant option participate phase 2 study . During phase 2 , participant receive calendar put mark every day listen guide imagery track . At end 4 week , participant turn calendar .
DOC.criteria: Staff nonprofit work minimum three shift per week Willing able use 815 minute lunch hour three time per week four week study Staff member exclude study currently listen guided imagery Those currently experience drug alcohol abuse , suicidal ideation , serious mental health issue care train mental health professional also exclude
